text: d malignant extragonadal extracranial germ cell tumors may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy to shrink the tumor followed by surgery to remove the sacrum and coccyx (bottom part of the spine) for tumors that are in the sacrum or coccyx.    - Combination chemotherapy to shrink the tumor followed by surgery to remove tumors that are in the mediastinum.    -  Biopsy followed by combination chemotherapy to shrink the tumor and surgery to remove tumors that are in the abdomen
